ValidationRule.description: Prevents creating multiple active games between the same two players
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Game_Status__c, "Pending"), ISPICKVAL(Game_Status__c, "In Progress")), NOT(ISBLANK(Player_X__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Player_O__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You already have an active game with this player. Complete the existing game first.
